modName: Time For Change - Guard Armor Retex
summary: This is just a small mod that changes the colors of the guard armors and city flags, hope you like it.
descriptionHtml:
Description: 
This is just a small mod that changes the color of the guard armors, shields and the city flags. I figured I want something different for a change so I hope everyone likes the mod.

So far I have done:
Solitude/Imperial - Was red now purple
Winterhold - Was white now red/pink
Dawnstar - Was white now black
Riften - Was purple now light blue
Whiterun - Was yellow now orange

To Do:
Markarth - To be gold 
Windhelm/Stormcloaks - not sure what color

To re-texture the Armors I used:
Fallout 3 Archive utility to get dds files 
Photoshop to retexture

Hope you like the mod :)
author: MrScrooge
